author: Dana Hedgpeth
title: Live updates: Known coronavirus cases in Washington region top 1,000; 8-week-old infant tests positive in D.C. - The Washington Post
description: Live updates: Known coronavirus cases in Washington region top 1,000; 8-week-old infant tests positive in D.C. The Washington Post Coronavirus update: DC positive cases jump to 183; nonessential businesses to close Wednesday WTOP More states extend school clo…
content:
The federal government is waiving a policy that required students to come in-person to pick up free school meals for the duration of coronavirus-driven closures, with officials citing concerns over families safety.
